title: Dygert, McNulty Open America’s Olympic Games Gold Medal Hunt in Time Trial
content:
Dygert and McNulty along with Taylor Knibb and Magnus Sheffield give Team USA its first chance to earn a medal in road racing in the 2024 Paris Olympic Games.

Read the full article at Dygert, McNulty Open America’s Olympic Games Gold Medal Hunt in Time Trial on Velo.
author: ahood
